Name: Reflection
About the game: Reflection is a VR puzzle adventure game with a traditional Chinese ring to it. The puzzle is innovative and unique. Players will challenge a multi-dimensional space created by the mirror, and use mirrors to solve puzzles by manipulating the world in mirror and entering it. With access to seven themed chapters, players are to crack seven types of puzzles deriving from the mirrors, including Logic, Physics, Space, Time and so on. Players can enjoy an immersive tour in the landscape, experiencing calligraphically tranquil landscapes in vastly expansive paint-like scenarios while solving puzzles. Key features: Challenge yourself with varied puzzles derivatived by one simple rule, change mirrror wold and enter the mirror. Enjoy yourself with the elegant and concise of thinking for hours. As you progress on seven chapters, feast your eyes on the 'Grand Sight Garden', set foot on the most famous imaginary garden of China. Tracing back to the fifth chapter in Dream of the Red Chamber, the game draws inspiration from Jia Baoyuâ€™s visit to The land of Faery. You will be guid to a sad story metaphor hinted by the puzzles, experience the combination of the karmic wheel of cause and effect, birth and rebirth. Original stylized music combining electronic music and ancient chinese style.
